description: Insert and enroll a user. be careful to not insert duplicate user_ids

params.name: user_id
params.description: Pick a userID (1 is the dev user)

params.name: uid
params.description: Insert an email for the user

params.name: name
params.description: Choose a name for the user

params.name: course_instance_id
params.description: Choose a course instance to enroll the user in (2 is the test instance)
